exceptions.exn: In environment p, a : nat Hnot1 : p <> 1 Hdivides : forall d : nat, divides p d -> d = 1 \\/ d = p q : nat Hdiv : square a = p * q Unable to unify "square a = p * q" with "a = p * q".

original: intros p a Hprime Hdiv. destruct Hprime as [Hnot1 Hdivides]. unfold divides in Hdiv. unfold divides in Hdiv. destruct Hdiv as [q Hdiv]. exists q. apply Hdiv.
